name: mitigation-rules-monorepo
description: Monorepo for mitigation rules engine applications

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:shared: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared-models & npm run build --workspace=packages/shared-components
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=packages/underwriting-ui & npm run build --workspace=packages/mitigation-rules-engine & npm run build --workspace=packages/applied-sciences-ui & wait
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run dev --workspace=packages/shared-models & npm run start --workspace=packages/underwriting-ui & npm run dev --workspace=packages/mitigation-rules-engine & wait
